backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, products, and order requests with role‑based access control. Provides CRUD‑style queries/mutations for profiles, product lookup, and order submission.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing chatbot‑related feature requests, associated files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of many frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH CSS variables for light/dark themes plus global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all public, chat, and admin routes using a root layout.
Protects admin routes by checking admin status and showing loading or unauthorized states.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for creating or editing products with form validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/Unauthoriz: Displays an access-denied message with login and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling login/logout via Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand info, navigation links including Chat and optional admin link, using admin status for conditional rendering.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, dropdown menus, and cart count.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component that wraps pages with header and footer.
frontend/src/data/sampleProducts.ts: Static list of sample product objects using BigInt values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Hooks for fetching order requests and individual orders with authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Hooks for adding, updating, and deleting products with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Determines admin status using actor and identity with reactive loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderRequest.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook that submits an order request through an actor and invalidates order-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides hooks to fetch product lists or single products using an actor, falling back to sample data on failure.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with brand story, values, and philosophy sections using styled UI components.
Admin dashboard linking to order management and product catalog sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists customer order requests with details, handling loading and error states for admin review.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting products using dialogs and product hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements a shopping cart page with item display, quantity controls, removal, and cart summary navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements an interactive chatbot page handling user messages, bot responses, quick replies, and navigation intents.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation, simulated submission, and contact information display.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero banner, value propositions, and navigation to shop and about sections.
frontend/src/pages/info/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a set of predefined blog-style posts about oxidized silver care, styling, gifting, and history.
frontend/src/pages/info/CertificationsQu: Shows informational sections about material quality, oxidized finishes, and handcrafted craftsmanship.
Presents jewelry category cards and a section describing oxidized silver with links to shop and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/info/CustomerReviewsP: Renders customer testimonials with ratings and a prompt for users to share their experiences.
frontend/src/pages/info/CustomizationPag: Explains custom design and engraving options, timelines, and steps for submitting personalization requests.
frontend/src/pages/info/FaqPage.tsx: Renders categorized FAQs with questions and answers about products, ordering, sizing, and shipping. Uses accordions for expandable sections.
frontend/src/pages/info/OrderTrackingPag: Displays order tracking instructions, including how references work and what tracking details customers receive. Provides guidance for contacting support for updates.
frontend/src/pages/info/PaymentMethodsPa: Explains the inquiry-based payment process and outlines available payment options. Includes cards describing steps and supported methods.
frontend/src/pages/info/PricingOffersPag: Details how pricing is determined, available promotions, taxes, and payment flexibility. Uses cards to present clear pricing and offer information.
frontend/src/pages/info/PrivacyPolicyPag: Provides the site’s privacy policy covering collected data, usage, and sharing practices. Structurally organized into sections using cards.
frontend/src/pages/info/ReturnsExchangeP: Renders the returns and exchange policy page with sections for returns, exchanges, and damaged items using cards and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/info/ShippingDelivery: Displays shipping and delivery information including timelines, locations, packaging, and an initial alert.
frontend/src/pages/info/TermsConditionsP: Provides the terms and conditions page with sections outlining usage rules, order process, and product information.
frontend/src/pages/OrderRequestPage.tsx: Handles order request form, validation, submission, and displays confirmation with reference ID.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info with images, description, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shows a grid of products with images, descriptions, prices, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Implements a persisted Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total-price functions.
frontend/src/utils/chatbot.ts: Defines chatbot message types and an intent-matching system using keyword and phrase scoring to generate responses and quick replies.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site scope expansion, architectural constraints, known issues, and existing feature definitions for Lunara Jewels.
